https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aoZA4rQxRpyqsmT7eNCswdOWqN2.jpg An out-of-work New York City actress returns home to the quaint small town she escaped 10 years before and finds a place far different than the hamlet she left. She suddenly finds performing possibilities and even romance that kind of blow her away. 'Tis the Season for Love
